name: Barbell Set
description: This set includes a 45-pound barbell and 4 10-pound weight plates. Perfect for weight lifting and strength training.

name: Functional Trainers
description: A high-performance Benches with adjustable speed and incline. Great for indoor cardio workouts.

name: Kettlebell
description: This 20-pound kettlebell is perfect for functional training exercises such as swings, snatches, and cleans.

name: Rowing Machine
description: A versatile piece of equipment that allows for a wide range of exercises, including squats, bench presses, and shoulder presses.

name: Stair Climber
description: Stair Climber with multiple resistance levels and built-in workout programs. Perfect for low-impact cardio workouts.

name: Dumbbell Set
description: This set includes a range of dumbbell weights from 5 to 25 pounds, making it perfect for a variety of strength training exercises.

name: Bench Press
description: A sturdy and adjustable bench press for building upper body strength and mass.

name: Spining
description: A compact and portable stair Spining with adjustable resistance levels. Perfect for at-home cardio workouts.

name: Gym rack
description: A Gym rack in varying heights, perfect for jump training and box jumps.
